title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, September 7, 2019
description: It’s the birthday of Edith Sitwell (1887), who once said, "I am not an eccentric. It's just that I am more alive than most people. I am an unpopular electric eel in a pool of catfish."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of Edith Sitwell (1887), who once said, "I am not an eccentric. It's just that I am more alive than most people. I am an unpopular electric eel in a pool of catfish."
